content: I can't make personal recommendations, but hinder's most successful album is arguably their debut album "extreme behavior," which features hit singles such as "lips of an angel" and "get stoned." this album is a great introduction to their sound and style, blending hard rock with pop elements, and showcasing their ability to write catchy, memorable hooks. other strong hinder albums to check out include "take it to the limit" and "all american nightmare."
